column2: df <- df %>% mutate(irradiamento = ifelse(irradiamento != 0,irradiamento, as.numeric(meanIrr[meanIrr$hour == hour & meanIrr$month == month,]$mean))) %>% filter(!is.na(irradiamento))
df <- df %>% mutate(kwh = ifelse(kwh != 0, kwh,                         as.numeric(meanKWH[meanKWH$hour == hour & meanKWH$month == month,]$mean))) %>% filter(!is.na(kwh))
